item.title: Trump Wins Appeal Over Freeze on Foreign Aid
item.description: A federal appeals court on Wednesday lifted a lower court injunction that required the Trump administration to continue making foreign aid payments.

item.title: Tamara Jachym to Newsmax: Trump's D.C. Clean-Up 'Needs to Be Done'
item.description: Tamara Jachym, the mother of slain congressional intern Eric Tarpinian-Jachym, said Wednesday that President Donald Trump's clean-up of Washington, D....

item.title: Fmr N.Y. Gov. Paterson to Endorse Adams in Mayoral Race
item.description: Former New York Gov. David Paterson announced on Wednesday that he will later in the afternoon publicly endorse Mayor Eric Adams for reelection.

item.title: Trump: Letitia James a 'Disgrace,' Points to Alleged Bank Cover-Up

item.title: Israeli FM Sa'ar Tells Newsmax Mission 'No' to Two-State Solution
item.description: Israel "will not allow" its land to be used for the creation of a Palestinian state, Foreign Minister Gideon Sa'ar said Wednesday.
